constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 35 (Wednesday, February 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACOBS of New York:
H.R. 1300.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following: This bill is enacted pursuant to the power
granted to Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of
the United States Constitution.
[Page H618]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Infrastructure Expansion Act of 2021
